items.sentence: I have a vague memory of what Tom looks like.
How long will Tom have to be in the hospital?
I guess we should do what Tom asked us to do.
Tom has never been able to beat me at tennis.
I saw Tom's car parked outside the warehouse.
Tom handed the envelope full of cash to Mary.
Tom refused to do what Mary wanted him to do.
Tom started going bald in his early thirties.
Tom took the only free seat left in the room.
The only girl Tom ever really liked was Mary.
This room is pretty much the way Tom left it.
Tom and Mary seem to know what they're doing.
The doctors don't know what's wrong with Tom.
I really think we need to be honest with Tom.
Is there any way I can get in touch with Tom?
Tom's demands became increasingly outrageous.
I've visited Tom a number of times in Boston.
There are a couple of boats under the bridge.
We watched the band marching down the street.
I thought that you wanted to go to Australia.
